name: WC Hide Shipping Methods Except Pont
author: Krizsán Csaba

sections.description: This plugin automatically hides all other shipping methods when “free shipping” is available during checkout process. It also includes an option to keep “local pickup” and “pont” (by Szathmari and by Viszt Péter) available alongside “free shipping”. Your donation is greatly appreciated.
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin & install it to your wp-content/plugins folder (or use the Plugins menu through the WordPress Administration section)
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Navigate to WooCommerce > Settings > Shipping > Shipping options.
  4. Select your option.
  5. Save and enjoy!
sections.faq:
Q: What WooCommerce version is required?

A: WC requires at least: 2.6
WC tested up to: 8.7.0

Q: Is this plugin compatible with new shipping zones?

A: Yes!
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.1

  • Bug fix: Show both local pickup AND pont when available.

1.2

  • Foxpost

1.3

  • Postapont plugin support

1.4

  • Foxpost Parcel plugin 1.1.9 support

1.5

  • Support Hungarian Pickup Points for Woocommerce 1.8.6 by Viszt Péter

1.5.1

  • WP 6.5.5
